mapper.insert: insert into chatbox (roomnumber, user1, user2) values ( (select nvl(max(roomnumber) + 1, 1) from chatbox), #{userid}, #{otherid} )
mapper.select: select count(*) from chatbox where (user1 = #{userid} and user2=#{otherid}) or (user1 = #{otherid} and user2=#{userid})
mapper.insert: insert into chat (idx, roomnumber, userid, message) values((select nvl(max(idx) + 1, 1) from chat), #{roomnumber}, #{userid}, #{message})
mapper.select: select * from chat where roomnumber=#{roomnumber} order by idx
